name: Rise Of Tanks: War Of Iron
name_original: Rise Of Tanks: War Of Iron
description:
Best 3D enemy tank battle game 2k16
Fire off missiles, destroy enemy bases and fight along side allies. Conquer your enemy with wrath of machine guns in sniper mode. You are the general of your base.
Now its time for WW2, General! Enemy forces are swarming across your base and their outrageous fleet of tanks is everywhere in our country. Jump in and take charge of battlefield. Destroy any enemy tank in sight with missile or machine gun.
Fight with world's most deadliest weapons. Tank invention changed the face of wars now use it and fight for your country. Kill any enemy before it take invasion and get hold of your base. Update tanks with armor and optimize it for deadliest results.
Game Features:
* Excellent 3D graphics and intuitive touch screen controls
* Tanks from the United States, Germany and the USSR
- Panzer
- T 90
- T 34-85
- KV 1
- Churchill
- M1 Abrams
- Bat Chatillon
- and many more
* Power-ups and upgrades
* Basic and advanced controls
* Advanced muzzle balancing for accurate missile shots
* Unlimited machine gum ammo for destroying anything in sight
* Amazing warship control
* Heavily armored tanks
* Snipe enemy tanks

Keep your most favorite video game in your pocket.
